```{r setup}
library(cardinalR)
library(langevitour)
```

```{r}
clust_data <- gen_multicluster(n = c(200, 300, 500), p = 4, k = 3, 
                               loc = matrix(c(0, 0, 0, 0,
                                              5, 9, 0, 0, 
                                              3, 4, 10, 7), nrow = 4, byrow = TRUE),
                               scale = c(3, 1, 2), shape = c("gen_gaussian",
                                                             "gen_bluntedcorn",
                                                             "gen_unifcube"), 
                               is_bkg = FALSE)

langevitour(clust_data |> dplyr::select(-cluster), 
            pointSize = 2, group = clust_data$cluster)
```
